overview: How can Girls Gone Wild get any wilder? Turn the reins over to Snoop Dogg!  You won't believe what happens when thousands of real girls from all over the globe join Snoop Dogg for the craziest party of the year! Just watch how far these girls go when Snoop Dogg is unleashed and takes control of the camera. Don't miss a minute of the video everyone's talking about!
tagline: It's hot, uncensored, and out of control!
title: Girls Gone Wild: Doggy Style
